sense.def:
To insinuate that something is true
pomeni na neprijeten način namigniti, da nekaj ni resnično.

seg.quote: He insinuated that my wife had betrayed my trust in her.

sense.def:
To insinuate oneself into a particular position
pomeni uspešno se spraviti v določen položaj;

seg.quote: He eventually insinuated himself into a key position in the Party.
